input_args.passage: 'Young Earth Creationism | Young Earth Creationists are among the more organized creationist movements. Two of the largest groups, Answers in Genesis and the Institute for ...'
input_args.claim: 'The second source provides more detail on the beliefs of Young Earth Creationists, stating that they believe the creation days in Genesis 1 were six literal (24-hour) days, and this occurred 6,000–12,000 years ago.'
